name: PID
description: The project identification number

name: Project_Name
description: The name of the project

name: Description
description: A brief written description of the project

name: Category
description: The type of project (i.e. bridges, roadways, schools, etc.)

name: Borough
description: The primary borough location for the project

name: Managing_Agency
description: The primary managing agency for the project

name: Client_Agency
description: The primary client agency for the project

name: Phase_Start
description: The project phase at the time of the first change record recorded

name: Current_Project_Years
description: The number of years since (in decimal form) the Design_Start date (i.e. the age of the project when the dataset was compiled)

name: Current_Project_Year
description: The number of years since (in integer form) the Design_Start date

name: Design_Start
description: The date at which the design phase of the project began

name: Budget_Start
description: The original forecasted budget (in USD) for the project

name: Schedule_Start
description: The original forecasted end date for the project

name: Final_Change_Date
description: The date of the project’s final change record within the time interval being investigated

name: Final_Change_Years
description: The number of years since (in decimal form) the Design_Start date when the Final_Change_Date was recorded

name: Phase_End
description: The project phase at the time of the last change record recorded within the interval period

name: Budget_End
description: The final forecasted budget (in USD) for the project at the time of the last change record within the interval period

name: Schedule_End
description: The final forecasted end date for the project at the time of the last change record within the interval period

name: Number_Changes
description: The total number of change records for the project observed during the interval period

name: Duration_Start
description: The original forecasted duration (in days) of the project at the time of the earliest available observation

name: Duration_End
description: The final forecasted duration (in days) of the project at the time of the last change record within the interval period

name: Schedule_Change
description: The total forecasted duration change (in days) observed during the interval period: Duration_End -Duration_Start

name: Budget_Change
description: The total forecasted budget change (in USD) observed during the interval period: Budget_End - Budget_Start

name: Schedule_Change_Ratio
description: Change metric: Schedule Change / Duration_Start

name: Budget_Change_Ratio
description: Change metric: Budget_Change / Budget_Start

name: Budget_Abs_Per_Error
description: Change metric: (Budget_Start – Budget_End) / Budget_End

name: Budget_Rel_Per_Error
description: Change metric: (Budget_Start – Budget_End) / Budget_Start

name: Duration_End_Ratio
description: Change metric: Duration_End / Duration_Start

name: Budget_End_Ratio
description: Change metric: Budget_End / Budget_Start

name: Duration_Ratio_Inv
description: Change metric: (Duration_Start / Duration_End) - 1

name: Budget_Ratio_Inv
description: Change metric: (Budget_Start / Budget_End) - 1
